name: Maginet
description:
Maginet is a turn-based abstract strategy game where two guilds of mages battle each other. Dominate the arena with your wit and wisdom, play locally with friends and against the AI, or online across the world!

Features




Simple rules on a familiar board get you started quickly, but learning to keep up the tempo of the battle is still a challenge!



Five mages with varying patterns challenge one another in different ways.



Level editor for custom arenas let you both test your skills in unexpected scenarios, while also improving your strategic knowledge.

...and more!


Local and online play allow you to play with your friends wherever you are.

AI-guild of mages will put you on a trial of wits, putting up a fight even with custom arenas.
